document.id: City of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 2013-2
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF SAN MATEO, STATE OF CALIFORNIA, REPEALING CHAPTER 2.22, “COMMUNITY IMPROVEMENT COMMISSION,” AND AMENDING CHAPTER 2.21, AND VARIOUS SECTIONS OF THE SAN MATEO MUNICIPAL CODE TO TRANSFER THE RESPONSIBILITIES OF THE FORMER COMMUNITY IMPROVEMENT COMMISSION TO THE COMMUNITY RELATIONS COMMISSION AND PROVIDE FOR A LIMITED TERM EXPANSION OF THE NUMBER OF COMMUNITY RELATIONS COMMISSION TO SIX MEMBERS

citations.citation: City of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 2013-2
